definition: Suangcheng county level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
Suangcheng county level city in Harbin 哈爾濱|哈尔滨[Ha1 er3 bin1], Heilongjiang
Shuangchengzi, former name of Ussuriisk city in Russian Pacific Primorsky region
A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens 查爾斯·狄更斯|查尔斯·狄更斯[Cha2 er3 si1 · Di2 geng1 si1]

sentences.english: Tripoli today is a tale of two cities.
sentences.chinese: 的黎波里今天上演雙城記。

sentences.english: He’d accepted that, and he’d read for a while.
sentences.chinese: 他接受了這一事實，並讀了一會《雙城記》。

sentences.english: Dickens' "A Tale of Two Cities" is a literary classic.
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯的《雙城記》是一部古典文學作品。

sentences.english: Dickens'; A Tale of Two Cities is a literary classic.
sentences.chinese: 狄更斯的《雙城記》是一部文學名著。

sentences.english: It was 2002, and he had decided to run the Twin Cities Marathon.
Where can I find A Tale of Two Cities by Dickens?
sentences.chinese: 我在哪兒可以找到狄更斯的《雙城記》？

sentences.english: The city of Lian Yungang has a typical structure of "one city, two towns".
sentences.chinese: 連雲港市呈現出典型的一市雙城式空間結構。

sentences.english: The visitors also made a promise to the United States to describe a reporter twin cities story.
sentences.chinese: 這位美國客還繪聲繪色地給記者描述了一個雙城故事。

sentences.english: Tale of Two Cities is my favorite English classic.
sentences.chinese: 《雙城記》是我最喜愛的英國文學名著。

sentences.english: It is showed that the ecologicalization degree of Shuangcheng Town is still low at present.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，目前雙城鎮的生態化程度仍較低。

sentences.english: The first English novel that I read was A Tale of Two Cities by Charles Dickens.
sentences.chinese: 我讀的第一本英代小說是狄更斯的《雙城記》。

sentences.english: On Tuesday, Shuangcheng Nestle Co said it would improve it weighing procedures.
sentences.chinese: 週二，雙城雀巢有限公司表示將改進稱重流程。

sentences.english: I don't know how many of you have read Tale of Two Cities.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道你們中多少人讀過雙城記。

definition: to establish ties or contact/in series connection (electricity)
appreciation of the finer things in life
to come up with an idea/generation of ideas/inspiration

to plot/to scheme/to bring about/to engineer/planning/producer/planner
